errors.unauthorized: You do not have permission to perform this action

title: Weni Agentic IA
description: An enteprise AI-based CX SOLUTION for brands and retailers.

improve.description: Connect agents to the Weni platform to access advanced features and customizable options.

abandoned_cart.title: Abandoned cart agent
abandoned_cart.description: Recover sales by reminding customers of items left in the cart.
abandoned_cart.disclaimer: This agent increases conversion, retains customers and encourages order completion.

disable.title: Disable agent
disable.description: Do you want to disable the '{{agent}}' agent? Once disabled, this agent will no longer be active in your project.

setup.title: Setting up your Weni App
setup.description: Getting everything ready for you! We're finalizing the initial setup to ensure a smooth experience.

details.title: Intelligent agents
details.description: Enhance intelligent agents by enabling control over conversation flows based on user intentions. Customize language, tone, and behavior to give the agent a unique identity and improve communication quality. See the demonstration of the exchange and return agent interaction on the side.

objective.title: Objective (optional)
objective.default: Your goal is to answer customer questions, inform the order status, provide product information, and sell. Your main features are: Shopping on WhatsApp and FAQ.

knowledge.title: Knowlege source
knowledge.context: Provide the content your agent will use to answer questions.

agent.error: Unable to set the agent. Please try again later.

integration.title: Integrate a support channel
integration.description: Choose the channel you want to use and follow the step by step to add it.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Channel
whatsapp.description: Utilize an enterprise WhatsApp account to enhance communication with contacts.
whatsapp.error: WhatApp unable to connect, check your credentials or try again later.

integration.error: Unable to integrate the feature. Please try again later.

error.title: Something went wrong
error.description: Retry or check back later if the issue persists.
